articles.title: Elon Musk loses appeal to tweet whatever he wants about Tesla | Engadget - Engadget
articles.description: Elon Musk has lost another attempt to end an SEC settlement that requires legal approval for some Tesla-related tweets..
articles.content: Elon Musk has failed in his latest attempt to challenge a ruling that requires a lawyer's approval for some Tesla-related tweets. A federal appeals court in Manhattan has rebuffed Musk's claim that t… [+1425 chars]
